description: This table contains the external provider information.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PROV_IDENT
columns.description: Identifier to link provider with other related groups

columns.name: PROV_WORK_PH
columns.description: Work phone number for the provider

columns.name: PROV_FAX
columns.description: Fax number for the provider

columns.name: PROV_EMAIL
columns.description: E-mail address for the event provider

columns.name: PROV_ADD_STREET
columns.description: Street address for the provider

columns.name: PROV_ADDR_CITY
columns.description: City for the provider work address

columns.name: PROV_ADDR_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
State for the provider work address


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROV_ADDR_ZIP
columns.description: Zip code for the provider work address

columns.name: PROV_SPEC_NAME
columns.description: Free text list of provider specialty names

columns.name: PROV_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description:
List of specialties for the provider


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PROV_DEA_NUM
columns.description: DEA number of the provider

columns.name: PROV_ST_LIC_NUM
columns.description: State license number of the provider

columns.name: PROV_NPI
columns.description: National Provider Identifier (NPI) number of the provider

columns.name: PROV_EXT_ID
columns.description: External vendor identifier of the provider

columns.name: PROV_CLINIC_NAME
columns.description: Clinic name where the provider practices

columns.name: PRESC_AGENT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the prescriber agent who enters the prescription on behalf of the provider.

columns.name: PROV_SER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the provider's mapped internal ID.

columns.name: PROV_CRED
columns.description: Contains external provider credentials.

columns.name: PROV_ADDR_RELATED_YN
columns.description:
If this item is set to 1, then the address information in the provider related group (DXR 9000) is related. This includes items for Address - Street, City, State, Zip Code as well as Phone, Fax, Email. This means that for one line in the provider related group (DXR 9000) it can be safely assumed that the Address, Phone, Fax, and Email are all related and can be grouped and displayed together.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PROV_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the external provider's provider type.

columns.name: PROV_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The internal category ID of the external provider's type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Resource


Physician

columns.name: PROV_PREFIX
columns.description: Prefix of Provider's Name

columns.name: PROV_SUFFIX
columns.description: Suffix of Provider's Name

columns.name: PROV_NADEA_NUM
columns.description: This column contains the narcotic addiction DEA number of the provider on this line.
